ygData.subject: RE: Charm after patch
ygData.msgSnippet: Yeah, doesn t work.  Used charm several times last night.  No message. But hey, now I can whack magicial only creatures with my lute. Can t wait for the day
ygData.messageBody:
Yeah, doesn't work. Used charm several times last night. No message.
But hey, now I can whack magicial only creatures with my lute.
Can't wait for the day that a patch actually addresses some of our issues,
most importantly the missing songs.


Elwyn Heartstring
Level 49 Bard
Erollisi Marr

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF [mailto:JasonF@...]
Sent: Friday, October 29, 1999 1:40 PM
To: Eqbards@...
Subject: [eqbards] Charm after patch


From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>


I got a tell from Cleaver on Fennin Ro last night (Hi Cleaver!) about Charm.
He was naturally enough curious as to whether I'd seen a message to the
effect that "Your charm has broken!" as was billed in the patch text. I had
not, and am sure disappointed about it. Has anyone found circumstances in
which we do receive a "charm breaks" message? Otherwise I chalk it up to a
bug or flat-out mistake, like as the "You have gotten better at
Swimming(71/90)" type messages that we never got.

Crier Sharpsong - 28th song bard on Fennin Ro
